member.name: ID3D12PipelineState.GetCachedBlob
member.summary: Gets the cached blob representing the pipeline state.
member.param: After this method returns, points to the cached blob representing the pipeline state.
member.returns: This method returns one of the Direct3D 12 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D12PipelineState
member.summary: Represents the state of all currently set shaders as well as certain fixed function state objects.
